Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

10 namespace Kassiopeia
11 {
12 
13  //0 is time
14  //1 is length
15  //2 is x component of position
16  //3 is y component of position
17  //4 is z component of position
18  //5 is x component of momentum
19  //6 is y component of momentum
20  //7 is z component of momentum
21 
22  KSMagneticField* KSTrajExactSpinParticle::fMagneticFieldCalculator = NULL;
23  KSElectricField* KSTrajExactSpinParticle::fElectricFieldCalculator = NULL;
24  double KSTrajExactSpinParticle::fMass = 0.;
25  double KSTrajExactSpinParticle::fCharge = 0.;
26  double KSTrajExactSpinParticle::fSpinMagnitude = 0.;
27  double KSTrajExactSpinParticle::fGyromagneticRatio = 0.;
28 
29  KSTrajExactSpinParticle::KSTrajExactSpinParticle() :
30  fTime( 0. ),
31  fLength( 0. ),
32  fPosition( 0., 0., 0. ),
33  fMomentum( 0., 0., 0. ),
34  fVelocity( 0., 0., 0. ),
35  fSpin0( 0. ),
36  fSpin(0., 0., 0. ),
37  fLorentzFactor( 0. ),
38  fKineticEnergy( 0. ),
39 
40  fMagneticField( 0., 0., 0. ),
41  fElectricField( 0., 0., 0. ),
42  fMagneticGradient( 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0., 0. ),
43  fElectricPotential( 0. ),
44 
45  fGuidingCenter( 0., 0., 0. ),
46  fLongMomentum( 0. ),
47  fTransMomentum( 0. ),
48  fLongVelocity( 0. ),
49  fTransVelocity( 0. ),
50  fCyclotronFrequency( 0. ),
51  fSpinPrecessionFrequency( 0. ),
52  fOrbitalMagneticMoment( 0. ),
53 
54  fGetMagneticFieldPtr( &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticField ),
55  fGetElectricFieldPtr( &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricField ),
56  fGetMagneticGradientPtr( &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient ),
57  fGetElectricPotentialPtr( &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential )
58  {
59  }
60  KSTrajExactSpinParticle::~KSTrajExactSpinParticle()
61  {
62  }

64  //**********
65  //assignment
66  //**********
67 
68  void KSTrajExactSpinParticle::PullFrom( const KSParticle& aParticle )
69  {
70  //trajmsg_debug( "exact particle pulling from particle:" << ret )
71 
72  if( fMagneticFieldCalculator != aParticle.GetMagneticFieldCalculator() )
73  {
74  //trajmsg_debug( " magnetic calculator differs" << ret )
75  fMagneticFieldCalculator = aParticle.GetMagneticFieldCalculator();
76 
77  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticField;
78  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient;
79  }
80 
81  if( fElectricFieldCalculator != aParticle.GetElectricFieldCalculator() )
82  {
83  //trajmsg_debug( " electric calculator differs" << ret )
84  fElectricFieldCalculator = aParticle.GetElectricFieldCalculator();
85 
86  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricField;
87  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential;
88  }
89 
90  if( GetMass() != aParticle.GetMass() )
91  {
92  //trajmsg_debug( " mass differs" << ret )
93  fMass = aParticle.GetMass();
94  }
95 
96  if( GetCharge() != aParticle.GetCharge() )
97  {
98  //trajmsg_debug( " charge differs" << ret )
99  fCharge = aParticle.GetCharge();
100  }
101 
102  if( GetSpinMagnitude() != aParticle.GetSpinMagnitude() )
103  {
104  //trajmsg_debug( " charge differs" << ret )
105  fSpinMagnitude = aParticle.GetSpinMagnitude();
106  }
107  if( GetGyromagneticRatio() != aParticle.GetGyromagneticRatio() )
108  {
109  //trajmsg_debug( " charge differs" << ret )
110  fGyromagneticRatio = aParticle.GetGyromagneticRatio();
111  }
112 
113  if( GetTime() != aParticle.GetTime() || GetPosition() != aParticle.GetPosition() )
114  {
115  //trajmsg_debug( " time or position differs" << ret )
116 
117  fTime = aParticle.GetTime();
118  fLength = aParticle.GetLength();
119  fPosition = aParticle.GetPosition();
120 
121  fData[ 0 ] = fTime;
122  fData[ 1 ] = fLength;
123  fData[ 2 ] = fPosition.X();
124  fData[ 3 ] = fPosition.Y();
125  fData[ 4 ] = fPosition.Z();
126 
127  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticField;
128  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricField;
129  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient;
130  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential;
131  }
132 
133  if( GetMomentum() != aParticle.GetMomentum() )
134  {
135  //trajmsg_debug( " momentum differs" << ret )
136  fMomentum = aParticle.GetMomentum();
137 
138  fData[ 5 ] = fMomentum.X();
139  fData[ 6 ] = fMomentum.Y();
140  fData[ 7 ] = fMomentum.Z();
141  }
142 
143  if( GetSpin0() != aParticle.GetSpin0() || GetSpin() != aParticle.GetSpin() )
144  {
145  //trajmsg_debug( " spin differs" << ret )
146  fSpin0 = aParticle.GetSpin0();
147  fSpin = aParticle.GetSpin();
148 
149  fData[ 8 ] = fSpin0/std::sqrt( -fSpin0 * fSpin0 + fSpin.MagnitudeSquared() );
150  fData[ 9 ] = fSpin.X()/std::sqrt( -fSpin0 * fSpin0 + fSpin.MagnitudeSquared() );
151  fData[ 10 ] = fSpin.Y()/std::sqrt( -fSpin0 * fSpin0 + fSpin.MagnitudeSquared() );
152  fData[ 11 ] = fSpin.Z()/std::sqrt( -fSpin0 * fSpin0 + fSpin.MagnitudeSquared() );
153  }
154 
155  //trajmsg_debug( " time: <" << GetTime() << ">" << eom )
156  //trajmsg_debug( " length: <" << GetLength() << ">" << eom )
157  //trajmsg_debug( " position: <" << GetPosition().X() << ", " << GetPosition().Y() << ", " << GetPosition().Z() << ">" << eom )
158  //trajmsg_debug( " momentum: <" << GetMomentum().X() << ", " << GetMomentum().Y() << ", " << GetMomentum().Z() << ">" << eom )
159 
160  return;
161  }
162  void KSTrajExactSpinParticle::PushTo( KSParticle& aParticle ) const
163  {
164  //trajmsg_debug( "exact particle pushing to particle:" << eom )
165 
166 
167  aParticle.SetLength( GetLength() );
168  aParticle.SetPosition( GetPosition() );
169  aParticle.SetMomentum( GetMomentum() );
170  aParticle.SetSpin0( GetSpin0() );
171  aParticle.SetSpin( GetSpin() );
172  aParticle.SetTime( GetTime() );
173 
174  if( fGetMagneticFieldPtr == &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::DoNothing )
175  {
176  aParticle.SetMagneticField( GetMagneticField() );
177  }
178  if( fGetElectricFieldPtr == &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::DoNothing )
179  {
180  aParticle.SetElectricField( GetElectricField() );
181  }
182  if( fGetMagneticGradientPtr == &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::DoNothing )
183  {
184  aParticle.SetMagneticGradient( GetMagneticGradient() );
185  }
186  if( fGetElectricPotentialPtr == &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::DoNothing )
187  {
188  aParticle.SetElectricPotential( GetElectricPotential() );
189  }
190 
191  //trajmsg_debug( " time: <" << GetTime() << ">" << eom )
192  //trajmsg_debug( " length: <" << GetLength() << ">" << eom )
193  //trajmsg_debug( " position: <" << GetPosition().X() << ", " << GetPosition().Y() << ", " << GetPosition().Z() << ">" << eom )
194  //trajmsg_debug( " momentum: <" << GetMomentum().X() << ", " << GetMomentum().Y() << ", " << GetMomentum().Z() << ">" << eom )
195 
196  return;
197  }
198

203  void KSTrajExactSpinParticle::SetMagneticFieldCalculator( KSMagneticField* anMagneticField )
204  {
205  fMagneticFieldCalculator = anMagneticField;
206  return;
207  }
208  KSMagneticField* KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetMagneticFieldCalculator()
209  {
210  return fMagneticFieldCalculator;
211  }

214  {
215  fElectricFieldCalculator = anElectricField;
216  return;
217  }
218  KSElectricField* KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetElectricFieldCalculator()
219  {
220  return fElectricFieldCalculator;
221  }

233  {
234  return fMass;

248  {
249  fSpinMagnitude = aSpinMagnitude;
250  return;

252  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetSpinMagnitude()
253  {
254  return fSpinMagnitude;

258  {
259  fGyromagneticRatio = aGyromagneticRatio;
260  return;

262  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetGyromagneticRatio()
263  {
264  return fGyromagneticRatio;

270 
271  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetTime() const
272  {
273  fTime = fData[ 0 ];
274  return fTime;
275  }
276  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetLength() const
277  {
278  fLength = fData[ 1 ];
279  return fLength;
280  }
281  const KThreeVector& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetPosition() const
282  {
283  fPosition.SetComponents( fData[ 2 ], fData[ 3 ], fData[ 4 ] );
284  return fPosition;
285  }
286  const KThreeVector& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetMomentum() const
287  {
288  fMomentum.SetComponents( fData[ 5 ], fData[ 6 ], fData[ 7 ] );
289  return fMomentum;
290  }
291  const KThreeVector& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetVelocity() const
292  {
293  fVelocity = (1. / (GetMass() * GetLorentzFactor())) * GetMomentum();
294  return fVelocity;
295  }
296  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetSpin0() const
297  {
298  fSpin0 = fData[ 8 ];
299  return fSpin0;
300  }
301  const KThreeVector& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetSpin() const
302  {
303  fSpin.SetComponents( fData[ 9 ], fData[ 10 ], fData[ 11 ] );
304  return fSpin;
305  }
306  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetLorentzFactor() const
307  {
308  fLorentzFactor = sqrt( 1. + GetMomentum().MagnitudeSquared() / (GetMass() * GetMass() * KConst::C() * KConst::C()) );
309  return fLorentzFactor;
310  }
311  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetKineticEnergy() const
312  {
313  fKineticEnergy = GetMomentum().MagnitudeSquared() / ((1. + GetLorentzFactor()) * fMass);
314  return fKineticEnergy;
315  }
316 
317  const KThreeVector& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetMagneticField() const
318  {
319  (this->*fGetMagneticFieldPtr)();
320  return fMagneticField;
321  }
322  const KThreeVector& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetElectricField() const
323  {
324  (this->*fGetElectricFieldPtr)();
325  return fElectricField;
326  }
327  const KThreeMatrix& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetMagneticGradient() const
328  {
329  (this->*fGetMagneticGradientPtr)();
330  return fMagneticGradient;
331  }
332  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetElectricPotential() const
333  {
334  (this->*fGetElectricPotentialPtr)();
335  return fElectricPotential;
336  }
337 
338  const KThreeVector& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetGuidingCenter() const
339  {
340  fGuidingCenter = GetPosition() + (1. / (GetCharge() * GetMagneticField().MagnitudeSquared())) * (GetMomentum().Cross( GetMagneticField() ));
341  return fGuidingCenter;
342  }
343  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetLongMomentum() const
344  {
345  fLongMomentum = GetMomentum().Dot( GetMagneticField().Unit() );
346  return fLongMomentum;
347  }
348  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetTransMomentum() const
349  {
350  fTransMomentum = (GetMomentum() - GetMomentum().Dot( GetMagneticField().Unit() ) * GetMagneticField().Unit()).Magnitude();
351  return fTransMomentum;
352  }
353  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetLongVelocity() const
354  {
355  fLongVelocity = GetLongMomentum() / (GetMass() * GetLorentzFactor());
356  return fLongVelocity;
357  }
358  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetTransVelocity() const
359  {
360  fTransVelocity = GetTransMomentum() / (GetMass() * GetLorentzFactor());
361  return fTransVelocity;
362  }
363  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetCyclotronFrequency() const
364  {
365  fCyclotronFrequency = (fabs( fCharge ) * GetMagneticField().Magnitude()) / (2. * KConst::Pi() * GetLorentzFactor() * GetMass());
366  return fCyclotronFrequency;
367  }
368  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetSpinPrecessionFrequency() const
369  {
370  fSpinPrecessionFrequency = std::abs( GetGyromagneticRatio() * GetMagneticField().Magnitude() );
371  return fSpinPrecessionFrequency;
372  }
373  const double& KSTrajExactSpinParticle::GetOrbitalMagneticMoment() const
374  {
375  fOrbitalMagneticMoment = (GetTransMomentum() * GetTransMomentum()) / (2. * GetMagneticField().Magnitude() * GetMass());
376  return fOrbitalMagneticMoment;
377  }
378 
379  //*****
380  //cache

382 
383  void KSTrajExactSpinParticle::DoNothing() const
384  {
385  return;
386  }
387  void KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticField() const
388  {
389  fMagneticFieldCalculator->CalculateField( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fMagneticField );
390  fGetMagneticFieldPtr = &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::DoNothing;
391  return;
392  }
393  void KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricField() const
394  {
395  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculateField( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fElectricField );
396  fGetElectricFieldPtr = &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::DoNothing;
397  return;
398  }
399  void KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateMagneticGradient() const
400  {
401  fMagneticFieldCalculator->CalculateGradient( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fMagneticGradient );
402  fGetMagneticGradientPtr = &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::DoNothing;
403  return;
404  }
405  void KSTrajExactSpinParticle::RecalculateElectricPotential() const
406  {
407  fElectricFieldCalculator->CalculatePotential( GetPosition(), GetTime(), fElectricPotential );
408  fGetElectricPotentialPtr = &KSTrajExactSpinParticle::DoNothing;
409  return;
410  }
